page.title: 16A Walk To Stilton School
page.content: We walked to Stilton School as part of our Domesday work.Stilton School has eleven members of staff and seven classrooms.It is much bigger than Folksworth School.They have a swimming pool for learners and a large dining room.On some afternoons the playgroup and clinic meet at the school.There are about 224 pupils at the school.The age range of the school is 5 to 11.When the children leave the school they go to Sawtry Village College where they will meet the children from Folksworth School.The headteacher of Stilton School is Mr.Wiggin.He is older than the headteacher of Folksworth School.We play football against Stilton School and we also share buses with them if we are going to the same place.
